     - Second set: 2 + 6 = 8 games
     - Total games in this match = 9 + 8 = 17 games

   - Against Eddie Dibbs: 17 games

4. Evaluate the claim: "Carlos Kirmayr had one more game against Van Winitsky than he did against Eddie Dibbs."
